urls.title: Surface water drainage - Ofwat
urls.description: Surface water drainage occurs when rainwater falls on a property and drains away. Most rainwater falling on properties drains into public sewers owned by the ten water and sewerage companies in England and Wales.

Looks like the winner of wettest place in #Cumbria yesterday was Seathwaite Farm #Borrowdale. 90.6mm for the rainfall day recorded at the @EnvAgencyNW raingauge. It's usually there or Honister Pass! Not too far away parts of the Eden valley had less than 10mm for the same period! https://t.co/N67hN115jz

It sounds too disgusting to be true... but I'm afraid it's not.  More raw sewage is being poured into Cotswold rivers by Thames Water. Wildlife dies. @EnvAgency lets it happen. Thames Water makes ¬£¬£¬£. Real life is more disgusting than fiction...! https://t.co/JlG3Q67ZPp
